name: WOUND_THERAPY_TREATMENTS
description: This table stores data about wound therapy treatments that have been applied to a wound.

columns.name: IP_LDA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the wound being treated.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: THERAPY_IP_LDA_ID
columns.description: The wound therapy that treated this wound.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The user who entered this data

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: ENTRY_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the user entered this data

columns.name: EDITED_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the previously documented value in the audit trail, if this line has been edited. Corresponds to LINE in WOUND_THERAPY_TREAT_AUDIT.
